text: @senatemajldr Covid-19 isn't over. Retail, restaurants aren't running at full capacity so they can't hire at full capacity. Gig workers are horribly impacted. Average unemployment benefit is $1512 monthly. Average rent on a 1 bedroom apt is $1078 + utilities etc. $200 a wk more isn't enough!
